title: Add Privacy, Terms, and Support pages

requirements.summary: Create Privacy Policy page at /privacy route with construction-themed design
acceptanceCriteria: Privacy page is accessible at /privacy route
Page uses consistent AppLayout header and footer
Content is readable with high-contrast text for outdoor visibility
Page follows the construction-themed design system

file_operations.description: Create Privacy Policy page component that displays privacy policy content using the construction-themed design with warm oranges, charcoal grays, and safety yellow from the existing color palette. Use high-contrast text for outdoor visibility. Include placeholder privacy policy content in a clean, readable format with proper spacing and typography.

Add /privacy route to the router configuration that renders the Privacy page component. Route should be accessible to both authenticated and unauthenticated users (public route, outside of AppLayout).

requirements.summary: Create Terms of Service page at /terms route with construction-themed design
acceptanceCriteria: Terms page is accessible at /terms route
Page uses consistent AppLayout header and footer
Content is readable with high-contrast text for outdoor visibility
Page follows the construction-themed design system

file_operations.description: Create Terms of Service page component that displays terms of service content using the construction-themed design with warm oranges, charcoal grays, and safety yellow from the existing color palette. Use high-contrast text for outdoor visibility. Include placeholder terms of service content in a clean, readable format with proper spacing and typography.
Add /terms route to the router configuration that renders the Terms page component. Route should be accessible to both authenticated and unauthenticated users (public route, outside of AppLayout).

requirements.summary: Create Support page at /support route with contact information and help resources
acceptanceCriteria: Support page is accessible at /support route
Page uses consistent AppLayout header and footer
Page includes contact information and help resources
Content is readable with high-contrast text for outdoor visibility
Page follows the construction-themed design system

file_operations.description: Create Support page component that displays contact information and help resources using the construction-themed design with warm oranges, charcoal grays, and safety yellow from the existing color palette. Use high-contrast text for outdoor visibility. Include sections for contact information (email, phone), FAQs, and help resources in a clean, readable format with proper spacing and typography.

Add /support route to the router configuration that renders the Support page component. Route should be accessible to both authenticated and unauthenticated users (public route, outside of AppLayout).

requirements.summary: Add footer navigation links to Privacy, Terms, and Support pages on Landing page
acceptanceCriteria: Footer on Landing page includes links to /privacy, /terms, and /support
Links are styled consistently with the construction-themed design
Links are easily tappable on mobile devices

file_operations.description: Add footer section with navigation links to /privacy, /terms, and /support pages. Style links consistently with the construction-themed design using the existing color palette (warm oranges, charcoal grays, safety yellow). Ensure links are easily tappable on mobile devices with appropriate touch target sizes (minimum 44x44px). Position footer at the bottom of the Landing page.
